org.openjdk.tools.javac.platform

接口 PlatformDescription.PluginInfo<T>

  • 类型参数:
    T - either Processor or Plugin
    封闭接口:
    PlatformDescription

    public static interface PlatformDescription.PluginInfo<T>
    Returns the description of annotation Processor or javac Plugin that should be enabled in the current javac run.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      String getName()
      Returns the name of the Processor or Plugin.
      Map<String,String> getOptions()
      Returns the options for the Processor or Plugin.
      T getPlugin()
      Returns the Processor or Plugin instance.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the name of the Processor or Plugin.
        返回:
        name of the Processor or Plugin.

      • getOptions

        Map<String,String> getOptions()
        Returns the options for the Processor or Plugin. For plugin, the map will be converted to a collection by concatenating the map's keys, the '=' sign and the map's values.
        返回:
        the options

      • getPlugin

        T getPlugin()
        Returns the Processor or Plugin instance.
        返回:
        the Processor or Plugin instance.
